Instruction: Place the chicken pieces evenly in a baking dish.
Combine ketchup, bell pepper, vinegar, salt, and garlic powder in a bowl; pour the mixture over the chicken pieces in the baking dish.

Roast the chicken in the preheated oven, basting regularly, until fully cooked and juices run clear, approximately 2 hours. Use a meat thermometer to ensure the inner temperature of the thickest part of the chicken at the joint reaches 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
